description: FHIR Value set/code system definition for HL7 v2 table 0725 ( Mood Codes)
name: v2 Mood Codes

text.div:
Mood Codes

CodeDescriptionNederlands (Dutch)CommentVersion
APT AppointmentAfspraakPlanned act for specific time and placeadded v2.6
ARQ Appointment RequestAfspraakverzoekRequest for Booking of an Appointmentadded v2.6
E.g. Use in Care Plans, added v2.8.1
EVN EventEventService actually happens or happened or is ongoing.added v2.6
EVN.CRT Event CriterionCriterium voor eventCriterion applying to Events for another Service to be applied.<p>This is an Act Mood Predicate.added v2.6
EXP ExpectationVerwachtingExpecting that something will occur independently of deliberate intent; e.g. expect a patient will discard medications.added v2.6
INT IntentIntentiePlan to perform a serviceadded v2.6
PRMS PromiseBelofteAn intent to perform a serviceadded v2.6
PRP ProposalVoorstelNon-mandated intent to perform an actadded v2.6
RQO Request-OrderAanvraag-OrderRequest or Order for a serviceadded v2.6
Similar uses of above moods ma added v2.8.1
